metadata.title: What Is the ROM/RAM Capacity Required for Touch?

sections.content:
Question:
I assume required ROM/RAM capacity depends on the level of the function realized in the system, but what is the basic ROM / RAM capacity required for the touch function?
Answer:
The ROM/RAM capacity required for touch functionality depends on the device and compiler.
Please refer to the APN below for the required size
RX Family FIT
CTSU module: https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rx-family-qe-ctsu-module-using-firmware-integration-technology?language=en
TOUCH module: https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rx-family-qe-touch-module-using-firmware-integration-technology?language=en
RL78 family SIS
CTSU module: https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rl78-family-ctsu-module-software-integration-system?language=en
TOUCH module: https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/apn/rl78-family-touch-module-software-integration-system?language=en
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
